inputs.value:
Wait 30 seconds to be automatically redirected to your signed-in personalized page...

Your request to access the subscription @{body('Parse_JSON_Resolve_Token')?['subscriptionName']} for the beneficiary @{body('Parse_JSON_Resolve_Token')?['subscription']?['beneficiary']?['emailId']} by purchaser @{body('Parse_JSON_Resolve_Token')?['subscription']?['purchaser']?['emailId']} from the Microsoft Commercial Marketplace is being processed.
